sentences.en: -- Strengthening the construction of infrastructure and improving the capability to prevent and control pollution.
sentences.cn: -- 加强基础设施建设,提高污染防治能力.

sentences.en: a $65 billion investment package in education, health care and infrastructure
sentences.cn: 用于教育、医疗和基础设施的650亿美元一揽子投资计划

sentences.en: Assuming this recession may be prolonged, infrastructure spending also scores well.
sentences.cn: 如果此次衰退持续很久, 基础设施开支同样也很有效.

sentences.en: Class B: liquid mineral exploration; mineral exploration infrastructure ( drilling ).
sentences.cn: 乙级: 液体矿产勘查; 勘查工程施工 ( 钻 ).

sentences.en: He also undertook to earmark $ 235 billion in government expenditure on infrastructure projects within five years.
sentences.cn: 同时承诺在五年内投资二千三百五十亿元进行基建.

sentences.en: Microsoft Certified IT Professional ( MCITP ) : focused on advanced infrastructure design.
sentences.cn: 专注于高级基础架构的设计.

sentences.en: Port has a power supply, water supply, communications and other infrastructure.
sentences.cn: 口岸建有供电 、 供水 、 通讯等基础设施.

sentences.en: Some countries lack a suitable economic infrastructure.
sentences.cn: 一些国家缺乏适当的经济基础设施。

sentences.en: Stress - determining the absolute capacities of the application and operational infrastructure.
sentences.cn: 应激能力绝对确定的基础设施和业务应用.

sentences.en: The Autonomous Region has built up its infrastructure from scratch.
sentences.cn: 基础设施从无到有,不断发展壮大.

sentences.en: The basic technology to support this method is the public key infrastructure ( PKI ).
sentences.cn: 而基于非对称加密体制的公钥基础设施 ( PublicKey Infrastructure:PKI ) 为这种思路提供了最底层、最基本的支撑技术和手段.

sentences.en: The electric power industry is a critical part of economic infrastructure.
sentences.cn: 电力行业是国民经济的基础产业.

sentences.en: The infrastructure, from hotels to transport, is old and decrepit.
sentences.cn: 从宾馆到交通，所有的基础设施都已陈旧失修。

sentences.en: Today, the infrastructure that supports the credit derivatives market is substantially stronger.
sentences.cn: 今天, 支撑信用衍生品市场的基础设施得到了显著加强.

sentences.en: Today, the mountain city, high - rises, tree - lined , wide streets, transportation, infrastructure and improving.
sentences.cn: 今天的山城, 高楼林立, 绿树成荫, 街道宽阔, 交通便利, 基础设施日臻完善.

sentences.en: Vast sums are needed to maintain the infrastructure.
sentences.cn: 保养基础设施需要巨额款项.

sentences.en: We should step up the development of infrastructure for research.
sentences.cn: 加强科学基础设施建设.

phrases.tran_cn: 基础设施；基础设施建设

trans.tran_en: the basic systems and structures that a country or organization needs in order to work properly, for example roads, railways, banks etc
